common.ingressEndpointDescription: To ingest events into the Smart Events instance, use a CloudEvents message to send POST requests to the ingress endpoint URL
common.name: Name
common.pageDoesNotExistError: The page you are looking for does not exist. It might have been moved or deleted.
common.quickStartAccess: For help getting started, access the quick start guide.
common.thisIsTakingLongerThanExpected: This is taking longer than expected.

errorHandling.endpointDescription: Invoke the endpoint below to retrieve the last errors, associated to this Smart Events instance.

errors.cantFindSchema: The information related to the error handling strategy for this Smart Events instance is currently missing.
errors.schemaGenericError: Error while retrieving the information related to the error handling strategy for this Smart Events instance.
errors.schemaGenericErrorDuringCreation: Error while retrieving information for the selected error handling method. Try again later.

instance.cloudRegionsUnavailable: Cloud provider regions are temporarily unavailable. Try again later.
instance.creationTemporaryUnavailable: Smart Events instances are unavailable for creation

errors.cantCreateInstance: Error while creating a Smart Event instance. Please, try again later.
errors.cantDeleteBecauseProcessorsInside: The "{{resource}}" Smart Events instance cannot be deleted until all associated processors are deleted.
errors.cantDeleteBecauseNotExisting: The Smart Events instance you are trying to delete, it does not exist anymore.
errors.cantDeleteTryLater: It is not possible to delete this Smart Events instance. Try again later.
errors.cantFindInstance: The Smart Event Instance you are looking for does not exist. It might have been deleted.
errors.cantUpdateInstanceNotActionableState: You can only update a Smart Event instance that is in either READY or FAILED state.
errors.cantUpdateInstanceGenericError: Error while updating the Smart event instance. Please, try again later.
errors.instanceDetailsGenericError: Error while retrieving the Smart Event instance details.
errors.instancesListGenericError: Error while retrieving the list of Smart Event instances.
errors.invalidName: A Smart Events Instance with this name already exists in your account.
errors.processorsListGenericError: Error while retrieving the list of Processors for this Smart Event instance.
errors.instanceQuotaExceeded: Your organization is out of quota.

instance.instanceWillBeAvailableShortly: Your Smart Events instance will be ready for use shortly after creation.
instance.quotaExceededErrorDescription: To deploy a new instance, delete an existing one first

processor.commaSeparatedValuesTooltip: For this filter type, it is necessary to specify a list of values separated by a comma.
processor.credentialEditFieldHelpText: This field is a credential and its value cannot be displayed. Entering a new value will update the processor configuration.

errors.cantCreateProcessorBecauseInstanceNotAva: The Smart Events instance you are associating it with is in the deletion phase or does not exist anymore.
errors.cantCreateProcessorOfThatType: It is not possible to create a Processor of that type.
errors.cantDeleteBecauseNotExisting: The Processor you are trying to delete, it does not exist anymore.
errors.cantDeleteTryLater: It is not possible to delete this Processor. Try again later.
errors.cantFindInstance: The Smart Event Instance, related to the Processor you are looking for, does not exist. It might have been deleted.
errors.cantFindParametersInfo: The information related to the parameters section for this Processor is currently missing.
errors.cantFindProcessor: The Processor you are looking for does not exist. It might have been deleted.
errors.cantUpdateProcessorBecauseNotReadyState: You can only update a Processor that is in either READY or FAILED state.
errors.instanceDetailsGenericError: Error while retrieving the Smart Event instance details, related to this Processor.
errors.invalidName: A processor with this name already exists in this instance.
errors.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL with http or https protocol.
errors.malformedTransformation: The Transformation Template for the Processor is invalid.
errors.parametersSectionGenericError: Error while retrieving the information related to the parameters section for this Processor.
errors.processorDetailsGenericError: Error while retrieving the Processor details.
errors.processorQuotaExceeded: Your organization is out of quota. To create a new processor, delete the existing one

processor.noProcessors: No processors for this Smart Event instance
processor.processorWillBeAvailableShortly: Your Processor will be ready for use shortly after creation.
processor.selectActionDescription: Select an action and provide its configuration.
processor.selectSourceProcessorTypeDescription: Select a source type and provide its configuration.
processor.sinkProcessorDescription: Sink processors help connect events to actions.
processor.sourceProcessorDescription: Source processors are ready-to-use connectors that allow to connect and stream data from external sources without having to write any code.
processor.transformationTemplateTooltip:
You can write the template content by using the QUTE language.
Please visit the <0>QUTE reference website to learn more about this template engine.
